cosmos.question: I'm big and bright, and I come out at night. I help you see with my silvery light. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I'm round, sometimes I'm not.
🧀 People say I'm made of cheese.
🐺 Animals howl at me.

cosmos.question: I am very hot and give light to the Earth. You can't look at me directly. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I rise in the East and set in the West.
🔥 I am a big ball of burning gas.
🌻 Plants need me to grow.

cosmos.question: I twinkle high above, far away from Earth. I am a small, bright dot in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am part of a group called a constellation.
🔭 You can see me better with a telescope.
🌟 Wishes are made upon me.

cosmos.question: I am a big, round ball that you live on. I have land and water, and spin around every day. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 You live on me!
💧 I am mostly covered in water.
🌎 I am the third planet from the sun.

cosmos.question: I am a big, red planet, sometimes called the Red Planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People are trying to visit me someday.
🏜️ I have a very dusty surface.
🍫 I am named after the Roman god of war.

cosmos.question: I am a huge ball of gas, the biggest planet in our solar system! I have a giant red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I have many moons.
💨 My red spot is a huge storm.
🔴 I am named after the king of the Roman gods.

cosmos.question: I'm a planet with beautiful rings around me made of ice and rocks. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are very shiny.
🧊 The rings are made of tiny bits of ice and rock.
🏛️ I am named after the Roman god of agriculture.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Ursa Major is one of me.
📜 People used to tell stories about me.
🌌 You can find me in the night sky.

cosmos.question: I am a big group of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our Sun is a part of me. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I can have billions of stars.
🌀 I can be spiral shaped.
🥛 Our one is called the Milky Way.

cosmos.question: I am a fast-moving ball of ice and dust that comes from far away and sometimes have a tail. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ My tail points away from the sun.
🥶 I am a frozen chunk of space stuff.
💫 I am sometimes called a 'dirty snowball'.

animal.question: I say 'Meow', I like milk, and I chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink from a bowl.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐈‍⬛ I have soft fur and a long tail.

animal.question: I bark, I wag my tail, and I love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🍖 I love to eat bones
🐾 I have four legs
🎾 I love to chase balls

animal.question: I have big ears, I like to eat carrots, and I hop around. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a vegetarian
🌱 I like to live in a burrow
🐇 I am small and furry

animal.question: I quack, I swim in the pond, and I have webbed feet. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I like to eat bread
🦢 I can be white, grey or brown.
💦 I love to swim

animal.question: I moo, I give milk, and I eat grass. What am I?

hints.text: 🐮 I'm a big farm animal.
🥛 I give something that's good in cereal.
🌱 I like to eat green things in the field.

animal.question: I oink, I like to roll in the mud, and I live on a farm. What am I?

hints.text: 🐽 I have a curly tail.
🐖 I am pink.
🌾 I eat slop

animal.question: I have a long neck, I eat leaves from tall trees, and I have spots. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I'm the tallest animal
🌿 I love acacia trees
🌍 I live in Africa

animal.question: I roar, I am the king of the jungle, and I have a big mane. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I live in Africa
👑 I'm at the top of the food chain.
🥩 I love to eat meat.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes, I live in Africa, and I look like a horse. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes are unique
🐎 I am related to horses.
🌱 I am a herbivore

animal.question: I have a trunk, I have big ears, and I am gray. What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am the largest land animal.
🥜 I love to eat peanuts
💦 I use my nose to drink water
